body:
Comment 1: 
We decided that comments were going to be plain text without
markup, and the text form of that comment is definitely right.
Writing /doc/code.html would be useless to the text reader.

I also don't think that godoc should rewrite all golang.org
references to point to a local instance. 

So while I understand the inconvenience I don't think
there's anything we can do.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WontFix**._
